/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. Power lines crisscross above the street, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of modernity to the scene. In the distance, trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban setting. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
